code: var SET_CALL_AGENT='SET_CALL_AGENT';var SET_GROUP='SET_GROUP';var CALL_ADDED='CALL_ADDED';var CALL_REMOVED='CALL_REMOVED';var SET_CALL_STATE='SET_CALL_STATE';var SET_PARTICIPANTS='SET_PARTICIPANTS';export var setCallAgent=function setCallAgent(callAgent){return{type:SET_CALL_AGENT,callAgent:callAgent};};export var setGroup=function setGroup(groupId){return{type:SET_GROUP,group:groupId};};export var callAdded=function callAdded(addedCall){return{type:CALL_ADDED,call:addedCall};};export var callRemoved=function callRemoved(removedCall,group){return{type:CALL_REMOVED,call:undefined,incomingCallEndReason:removedCall.isIncoming?removedCall.callEndReason:undefined,groupCallEndReason:!removedCall.isIncoming&&!!group?removedCall.callEndReason:undefined};};export var setCallState=function setCallState(callState){return{type:SET_CALL_STATE,callState:callState};};export var setParticipants=function setParticipants(participants){return{type:SET_PARTICIPANTS,remoteParticipants:participants};};export{SET_CALL_AGENT,SET_GROUP,CALL_ADDED,CALL_REMOVED,SET_CALL_STATE,SET_PARTICIPANTS};
